programme.title: Popularity Papers
programme.desc: Personality Test: Lydia and Julie take a personality test to determine if they truly have the personality traits to be a Highly Popular Person. (S1, ep 23)

programme.title: Popularity Papers
programme.desc: Let's Sick Together: Amid a house overrun by the flu, Lydia sets out to investigate whether the school will notice her absence and make her more popular. (S1, ep 24)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Breaking Dad: Hank becomes Max and Phoebe's new science teacher. When he accidentally eats special turkey sandwiches that make him fall asleep, the twins must help him out. (S1, ep 20)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: The Thunder Van: Hank brings the Thundervan for Phoebe to continue her superhero training, but when the kids take a joyride, Hank gives them a ride they will never forget. (S2, ep 3)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Rumblr: Captain Man creates a profile on a matchmaking app for heroes and villains. Kid Danger does the same, and the two set up a double-fight to square off with some new villains. (S5, ep 33)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Cave the Date: The gang set up a secret underground restaurant in the Man Cave for Charlotte's private dinner with a music superstar. When word gets out, unwanted guests crash the party. (S5, ep 34)

programme.title: Hunter Street
programme.desc: Appeals: Anika returns to the forest looking for answers, but comes across a shocking scene. The Hunters are doing everything to find their stolen artifacts. But will it be enough? (S3, ep 19)

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Papa Smurf disappears in 'Where's Papa Smurf?', then in 'Who's Heftier?', Wimpy challenges Hefty to a test of strength and wins by accident! (S1, ep 4)

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Tree of Knowledge: The Smurfs unwittingly ask Dimwitty for advice when he gets stuck in a hollowed out tree, thinking they've found the Tree of Knowledge. (S3, ep 7b)

programme.title: Best & Bester
programme.desc: Best and Bester decide to go on a match-making mission in 'That's so Cupid', and in 'Buddy Odour', Toot moves into the Sub with Best and Bester, but there's no getting away from her smell! (S1, ep 18)

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob and Patrick buy a toy and have to learn to share it in 'Yours, Mine and Mine', and then in 'Kracked Krabs', SpongeBob goes with Mr. Krabs to the Cheapest Crab Convention.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob's Last Stand: SpongeBob and Patrick protest against the construction of a highway that would destroy Jellyfish Fields.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks
programme.desc: Simon agrees to face off against Derek on a reality show in 'I Will Survive', then in 'Alvin's Got A Brand New Bag', Alvin accidentally ruins Brittany's bag and must replace it. (S1, ep 26)

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: When Alvin makes fun of Simon's magic act, Simon challenges him to a magic duel in 'Simon the Superb', then in 'The Sub', Alvin reluctantly signs up to teach the after school music class. (S2, ep 3)

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Plankton needs more help stealing the secret formula in 'Plankton's Intern', then in 'Patrick's Tantrum', Patrick gets angry whenever he hears a bell, so his friends help him in their own ways.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Luan takes the lead in the school play in 'An Inspector Falls', then in 'One In A Million', Lincoln and Clyde are determined to be Flip's millionth customer to bag the big reward. (S7, ep 15)

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Hazel wishes she lived in a luxury hotel in 'Wellsington Hotellsington', then in '1500 Minutes of Fame', Hazel wishes she was famous at school. (S1, ep 4)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Significant Brother: Sparks fly between Phoebe and Cherry's visiting brother. After Cherry begs Phoebe not to date her brother, Phoebe must decide between love and friendship. (S4, ep 19)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Car Trek: Charlotte's birthday road trip to see the Boo Man Group perform gets sidetracked by a Captain Man and Kid Danger emergency. (S4, ep 12)

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: The Devil Wears Rodentia: Brittany's dream of being a fashion designer turns into a nightmare when she gets a job and her ideas are stolen.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Career Day: Alvin suspects Dave of being a local bank robber when Dave starts acting suspiciously and giving the boys gifts.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Lost in Space Camp: Theodore must prove he's got "the right stuff" when the Chipmunks and Chipette's head off to space camp.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Super Hot Chocolate: Theodore goes into a deep funk after he burns his tongue on some super-hot chocolate and loses his sense of taste.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: An imprisoned Plankton tries to break out of jail and steal the secret formula in 'Jailbreak!', and then in 'Evil Spatula', Spongebob replaces his broken spatula with a magical one from Plankton.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Mr Krabs gets trapped in Bikini Bottom's brand-new bank in 'Safe Deposit Krabs', and then in 'Plankton's Pet', Plankton gets a pet to cheer himself up.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Lola and Lana try out for Bluebell Scouts in 'Patching Things Up', and in 'Cheater by the Dozen', when Lincoln and Clyde think Bobby is cheating on Lori they follow him gathering evidence. (S2, ep 6)

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: The kids take home security to the next level in 'Lock 'N Loud', then in 'The Whole Picture', Lincoln and Clyde try to recreate all of Lincoln's childhood photos, before his memory fades. (S2, ep 7)

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Alvin encourages Simon to write a frank email in 'Un-send!', then in 'The Orb', when Simon notices that Theodore has a hard time saying no, he creates the "No-Buddy". (S2, ep 12)

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: The Principal's cat goes missing in 'The Music Box', then in 'Special Delivery', Theodore's been mistakenly mailed off in a box, so Simon and Alvin have to get him home. (S2, ep 13)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Dog Day After-School: Desperate to get Mom's tablet back after it is confiscated at school, Billy and Nora get help from Phoebe, who wants to prove she can be as sneaky as Max. (S3, ep 18)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Original Prankster: Despite promising his girlfriend he would stop pranking, Max pulls an epic gag which his friend is about to get expelled for. (S3, ep 21)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Hour of Power - Part 1: When criminal Drex embarrasses Kid Danger and traps Captain Man, Kid Danger must use the help of Schwoz to gain a super power and defeat Drex. (S3, ep 7)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Hour of Power - Part 2: When criminal Drex embarrasses Kid Danger and traps Captain Man, Kid Danger must use the help of Schwoz to gain a super power and defeat Drex. (S3, ep 8)

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: Bunny sends Squidina to camp, so Patrick works with new staff in 'Is there a Director in the House?', then in 'Star Cruise', the Star family enjoys a cruise ship vacation... in outer space. (S2, ep 8)

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Luna and the Moon Goats have to find a replacement guitarist in 'Music To My Fears', then in 'Fluff and Foiled', Lincoln is determined to get laundry duty finished as fast as possible. (S7, ep 10)

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Hazel faces the Wish Trials in 'Department of Magical Violations', then in 'Teacher's Pal', Hazel wishes her teachers were friends. (S1, ep 2)

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SquarePants Family Vacation: When SpongeBob and Patrick get lost on a family road trip to the Great Barrier Reef, they end up on the adventure of a lifetime.

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: Bummer School: Chloe, Jinx, and Booch are designing a new school mascot, but Max and Phoebe's fighting ruins the project. They realize their twin-fighting impacts Chloe in new ways now. (S1, ep 3)

programme.title: Rock Island Mysteries
programme.desc: The Cave To Everywhere - Part 1: On the day of the ball, Taylor is convinced her Uncle Charlie is trying to make contact. She sets off on a dangerous scavenger hunt to retrieve his message. (S2, ep 1)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Danger Games - Part 3: When Dr. Minyak plans to ruin Double G's concert, Captain Man and Kid Danger join forces with the Game Shakers to defeat Dr. Minyak and keep Double G safe. (S4, ep 3)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Sick & Wired: Thinking that Henry is not telling the truth about being sick, Ray plants cameras and microphones in Henry's house to catch him in a lie. (S4, ep 4)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Cape Fear: Phoebe tries to get back in superhero training, but when she sneaks out to a party and saves someone's life, she asks Max to take the credit, and he becomes a hero. (S2, ep 22)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Call of Lunch Duty: Phoebe discovers that Max is behind the latest pranks at school, but when she refuses to give up his secret to the principal, she must face the consequences. (S2, ep 23)

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: Let's Go to the Movies!: ShoutOut has a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity to sell a movie to Hollywood bigshot Deuce Van Nuys, and the rest of the gang share their own epic movie ideas too. (S2, ep 16)

programme.title: Victorious
programme.desc: Wok Star: Tori helps Jade find a theatre to perform a play Jade wrote. When the sponsor demands changes that will ruin Jade's play, Tori must make things right before opening. (S1, ep 16)

programme.title: Popularity Papers

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Ox Pox: When Piper gets a mysterious illness, Captain Man must travel back in time to the 1700s to find the only cure. (S2, ep 18)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: I Know Your Secret: Henry gets a series of mysterious notes from someone and worries that this person may know his secret identity. (S2, ep 19)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: 21 Dump Street: After Max is dumped, Phoebe tries to cheer him up by introducing him to another girl. However, Max's date steals Dr. Colosso when she sees Max's treatment of him. (S4, ep 14)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Super Dupers: Max and Phoebe use their powers to give their friend a confidence boost, but the gesture backfires when he starts to think he that he has superpowers of his own. (S4, ep 15)

programme.title: Victorious
programme.desc: Part 1: Cat and Jade get banned from a karaoke bar. The boys look after Trina after her wisdom teeth are removed, while Tori helps Jade and Cat get revenge. (S1, ep 19)

programme.title: Victorious
programme.desc: Part 2: Cat, Jade and Tori return to the karaoke bar for a sing-off, while the boys struggle to look after Trina. (S1, ep 20)

programme.title: Popularity Papers
programme.desc: The Wonderful Wizard of Mapleview - Part 1: Julie takes a bold stance against the "Mapleview People of the Year" page, saying it's an outdated popularity contest that should be abolished. (S1, ep 25)

programme.title: Popularity Papers
programme.desc: The Wonderful Wizard of Mapleview - Part 1: Julie takes a bold stance against the "Mapleview People of the Year" page, saying it's an outdated popularity contest that should be abolished. (S1, ep 25)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Four Supes and a Baby: Phoebe drags Billy and Nora to the park to meet her crush and his baby brother. When Max takes the younger kids home, they accidentally grab the wrong one! (S2, ep 1)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Max's Minions: Max takes on a group of freshmen to be his minions, but when they turn the tables on him, he must work out how to regain his place as the baddest boy in school. (S2, ep 5)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Game of Phones: When a young girl chains herself outside of Junk-N-Stuff, Kid Danger and Captain Man are forced to help find her beloved phone. They unexpectedly see some familiar faces. (S5, ep 35)

programme.desc: Escape Room: Kid Danger and Captain Man are tricked into entering an escape room by a factory owner. They are trapped inside with two new kids who are oddly good at solving the puzzles. (S5, ep 36)

programme.title: Hunter Street

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Scaredy and Hefty disguise themselves as girls in 'Some Like It Not', then in 'Joke's on You', Vanity tires of Jokey's exploding box and decides to boobytrap it with an even bigger boom. (S1, ep 5)

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Reaching for the Stars: To apologize for breaking his telescope, Monkey goes looking for a star for Papa Smurf. (S3, ep 8a)

programme.title: Best & Bester
programme.desc: Best and Bester don't look like their passport photos in 'Fight of Flight', and in 'Employee of the Month', Best wants to let his sister win, but finds that losing doesn't come naturally. (S1, ep 19)

programme.desc: Squidward bets SpongeBob that he can't go a day without crying in 'A Day Without Tears', and then in 'Summer Job', Mrs Puff has to work through her summer break at the Krusty Krab.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob and Squidward are sent to collect unpaid bills in 'Bubble Bass's Tab', then in 'Kooky Cooks', Spongebob and Squidward cook a fancy meal for Mrs. Puff, but every dish becomes a dispute.

programme.desc: Ronnie Anne tries to get into Luan's pranking academy in 'Dread of the Class', then in 'Welcome to the Doll Heist', Lily accidentally trades Eunice away. (S7, ep 16)

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: The sisters think Lincoln is bad luck in 'No Such Luck', and in 'Frog Wild', when Lincoln finds out his class is dissecting frogs, he and Lana embark on a mission to rescue them. (S2, ep 8)

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Lincoln and Clyde only have one day to complete their activities in 'Kick the Bucket List', then in 'Party Down', Lori throws a party, but her plan for a sophisticated affair backfires. (S2, ep 9)

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: The Chipettes set out to prove that being a superhero isn't just a guy thing in 'Super Girls', then in 'Held Back', Alvin must pass his next test, or be separated from his brothers. (S2, ep 15)

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Alvin decides to host the coolest paintball party in 'It's My Party', then in 'Keeping up with the Humphries', the boys feel pressure to keep up with their nemesis Bocarter. (S2, ep 16)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Chutes and Splatters: Phoebe's newest mission is to babysit President Kickbutt's troublemaking daughter, but things get out of hand when they sneak into an illegal nightclub. (S3, ep 23)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: I'm Gonna Forget You, Sucka: After Cherry posts a photo revealing the Thundermans' secret, the Hero League forces Phoebe to end the relationship with her best friend. (S3, ep 17)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: JAM Session: When Ray hears that Piper is going to Junior Anger Management to work on her anger issues, he bets Henry that he can make her lose her temper before the night ends. (S3, ep 9)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Green Fingers: After Schwoz creates a disease that accidentally effects Charlotte, Henry, his family, and even Ray, he quarantines them in Henry's house in order to find a cure. (S3, ep 10)

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: The enemies of the Star family team up to exact their revenge in 'Best Served Cold', then in 'Tattoo Hullabaloo', Bunny's sailor tattoo finds himself in trouble. (S2, ep 9)

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Lincoln needs money for a rare collectible in 'Beg, Borrow and Steele', then in 'There Will Be Mud', the Hunnicutts strike it rich overnight, and move to a fancy wealthy neighbourhood. (S7, ep 19)

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Hazel wishes to meet a live dinosaur in 'A Dinosaur in Dimmadelphia', then in 'Fearless', Hazel wishes that Jasmine was fearless. (S1, ep 3)

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Hello Bikini Bottom!: A concert promoter wants to send SpongeBob and Squidward on the road, until greedy Mr. Krabs decides to manage them - and their "world tour" - himself!

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: The Parent Zap: After Phoebe and Max let Chloe's friends watch a horror movie and eat sweets, Jinx and Booch's parents want to meet Chloe's. So Max and Phoebe transform into Hank and Barb. (S1, ep 4)

programme.title: Rock Island Mysteries
programme.desc: The Cave To Everywhere - Part 2: On the day of the Rock Island Ball, Taylor is convinced her Uncle Charlie is trying to make contact. (S2, ep 2)

programme.title: Rags
programme.desc: A modern Cinderella story about Charlie, an orphan with a dream, and Kadee, a pop star with a glitzy life. Starring Keke Palmer, Max Schneider, Avan Jogia, Drake Bell and Burkley Duffield.

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: The Supies: The Supies is Swellview's biggest night for superheros, and Captain Man is not invited. Danger Force enlists Henry's help to make sure the night goes off without a hitch! (S2, ep 17)

programme.title: Victorious
programme.desc: Trapped In An RV: A heat wave hits LA and the gang heads for the beach in Beck's RV. But once there, they find themselves trapped inside as the temperature rises. (S1, ep 17)

programme.title: Popularity Papers
programme.desc: Balm Squad: The annual skip-a-thon fundraiser is taking place, and students are encouraged to take part to help raise money for charity and win a private all-expenses-paid pizza party! (S1, ep 11)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: A Finata Full Of Death Bugs: When a dangerous pinata ends up at a kids' birthday party, Kid Danger and Captain Man must go undercover and step in before it's too late. (S3, ep 1)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Love Muffin: When Captain Man suddenly announces he's getting married, Henry and Charlotte go searching for answers only to discover that things are not as they seem. (S3, ep 2)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Come What Mayhem: With one of his old pranks set to ruin a superhero gathering, Max needs Phoebe's help to stop it. When their powers aren't enough, Phoebe makes a life-altering decision. (S4, ep 18)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Save the Past Dance: Tired of tales of Hiddenville's legendary mayor, the kids use a time machine to travel back to disprove the myths. But they inadvertently alter the past. (S4, ep 27)

programme.title: Victorious
programme.desc: Beck Falls for Tori: When Tori gets her big break acting in a movie, she's confronted with the consequences of lying on her resume when she's asked to perform a big stunt. (S2, ep 1)

programme.title: Victorious
programme.desc: Helen Back Again: When Principal Eikner leaves, the school hires a new principal who makes all the students re-audition in order to keep their spots. Who will get kicked out? (S2, ep 2)

programme.title: Popularity Papers
programme.desc: Teamwork Makes The Scene Work: Will being an actor make you popular? When the drama teacher announces the best actor in their class will get to perform at assembly, Lydia is thrilled. (S1, ep 2)

programme.desc: Bear Charm: Grizzy believes that the she-bear he's in love with has been turned into a frog. He looks through the ranger's book of fairytales, searching for a way to turn her back. (S1 Ep22)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Bear's Best Friend: Grizzy discovers a baby raccoon near the log cabin. When the lemmings drag the baby into their dangerous games, the overprotective Grizzy steps in. (S1 Ep23)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Super Grizzy Bros: Grizzy discovers the joy of video games on the ranger's console. The lemmings want to try their hand at the joystick but Grizzy refuses to interrupt his racing game. (S1 Ep24)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Baby Brother Blues: When Beth is told that the impending arrival of a baby brother is about to ruin her life, she runsaway to find a new family. (S2 Ep37)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Space Codyty: Izzy, convinced that Cody is an alien, embarks on a journey through space to take him back home. (S2 Ep38)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Gobble Head: Chef accidentally cooks up a killer cyborg turkey in a failed attempt to get the kids to appreciate him on Appreciation Day. (S2 Ep39)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Snack To The Future: Owen wants his favourite treat, 'Jiggle Giggle', so bad that he's uses a time machine to get to snack time quicker. (S2 Ep40)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Me, My Elf, And I: Duncan tricks Chef into taking the class to the North Pole to remove his name from the naughty list. (S2 Ep41)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Snow Country For Old Men: In an attempt to win the holidays, Chef brings snowmen to life. But when they turn out to be evil, Chef and the kids have to jingle some bells. (S2 Ep42)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: The Gold And The Stickerful: Courtney becomes infatuated with a new gold sticker incentive program that Chef introduces to the class. (S2 Ep43)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Bad Seed: Chef introduces the kids to agriculture by teaching them how to grow plants from seeds. But when Izzy shows her seed too much love, it turns into a monster! (S2 Ep44)

programme.title: Droners
programme.desc: Synchro / Out of Sync: The Tikis must team up with the Mirages, and worse: Hannah and Corto must fly in sync to win. (S1 Ep15)

programme.title: Jade Armor
programme.desc: The Talk: The Crimson Lord uses a Shard-embedded megaphone to steal voices, including L.J.'s. Mute before she's in the suit, Jade plays videos of herself training. (S1 Ep3)

programme.title: Jade Armor
programme.desc: Eye of the Tiger: Newsflash: Jade Armor stole the Golden Dragon! L.J. is appalled. Who is the imposter making her look bad? (S1 Ep4)

programme.title: Miraculous: Tales Of Ladybug & Cat Noir
programme.desc: Captain Hardrock: Ladybug faces Juleka's mother, now Captain Hardrock. (S2 Ep15)

programme.title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug
programme.desc: and Cat Noir: Hack-San: What if Marinette had no choice but to leave Paris on the day when Shadow Moth decided to create a new supervillain? (S4 Ep16)

programme.title: New: Yu-Gi-Oh! Sevens
programme.desc: A Deep-Sea Duel: When Yuga and his friends get stranded on a ship at sea things start to get fishy! (S1 Ep15)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Breaking Bite: Beth becomes the big dog on campus after she bites Duncan, but being the big dog is a dangerous thing, especially when you didn't actually bite anybody! (S3 Ep9)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: I Dream of Meanie: When Cody keeps screaming in his sleep, Gwen and Duncan take a trip into Cody's dreams to see what is scaring him. (S3 Ep10)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Squirrels Squirrels Squirrels: Courtney's attempt to make Chef a better teacher fails when a squirrel gets his hands on her mind-control device. (S3 Ep11)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Say Hello to My Little Friends: After telling the kids he will not miss them over the long weekend, Chef locks himself into the school and finds out he was very, very wrong. (S3 Ep12)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: WaterHose-Five: It's the hottest day of the year and a broken air conditioner leads to a water battle of epic proportions to determine who controls the garden hose. (S3 Ep13)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Cody the Barbarian: Cody is set to inherit a video game empire from his long lost uncle, but only if he and his friends have what it takes to conquer a fantastical live action video game. (S3 Ep14)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: TP2: Judgement Bidet: When the city experiences a toilet paper shortage, Beth and Harold investigate and discover it's their old rival Sewer Mike who is the mastermind behind it all. (S3 Ep15)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Dial B for Birder: Harold uncovers a secret plot that Chef's new parrot is hatching and tries to save his teacher, only to discover that Sugar figured it out before him. Or did she? (S3 Ep16)

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! Sevens
programme.desc: A Deep-Sea Duel: When Yuga and his friends get stranded on a ship at sea things start to get fishy! (S1 Ep15)

programme.title: Dragon Ball Super
programme.desc: Despair Once Again! Resurrection of the Evil Emperor Freeza!: The remaining members of the Frieza Force seek revenge for their fallen leader. (S1 Ep19)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: School District 9: When a career-predicting machine tells Owen he has no skills to offer the world, Owen finds a way to prove the machine wrong in the most Owen way possible. (S2 Ep52)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Gumbearable: After accidentally swallowing a piece of gum, Owen has to protect his friends by jumping into a gum volcano. (S3 Ep1)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Whack Mirror: Chef warns Beth and Cody that making goofy faces into a mirror will cause them to get stuck that way. It turns out he was right, just not in the way any of them ever imagined. (S3 Ep2)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Broken Back Kotter: Izzy nominates Chef for the Daycare Professional of the Year award and will do whatever it takes to see him win. As it turns out, it takes a lot. (S3 Ep3)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Weekend at Buddy's: After Cody's best friend doll breaks on their watch, Owen and Beth put themselves in grave danger while trying to do the right thing. (S3 Ep4)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: MacArthur Park: After losing countless jobs because of the kids, MacArthur shows up at the school seeking revenge. (S3 Ep5)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Last Mom Standing: When Chef's mum and Leshawna's grandmother drop their loved ones off at the same time, it kicks off a dangerous competition for who is the most caring mother figure. (S3 Ep6)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Carmageddon: Duncan is rattled when Chef, tired of having his car destroyed, buys a new one that is completely indestructible. (S3 Ep7)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Exercising The Demons: When a severe screen addiction makes the kids lazy, Chef brings in a professional to whip them into shape. (S2 Ep6)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Pudding The Planet First: After Chef says opposing viewpoints make the world more interesting and fun, Izzy applies it in the worst way possible. (S2 Ep7)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Supply Mum: When Chef's mum becomes the supply teacher for a day, Duncan replaces Chef's to-do list with one of his own. (S2 Ep8)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Mooshy Mon Mons: After eating Chef's extremely rare and expensive chocolates, Courtney drags Owen, Izzy and Beth all the way to the Norberian Alps of Fruffenberg to replace them. (S2 Ep9)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Student Becomes The Teacher: Chef is knocked unconscious right before a school board evaluator shows up for a big review. Now Owen has to fill in so Chef doesn't lose his teaching licence. (S2 Ep10)

programme.title: Droners
programme.desc: The Polaris Predicament: After several defeats, Manta is replaced by Pavel, his superior from the Polaris academy. He turns out to be more dangerous and violent than Manta. (S1 Ep23)

programme.title: Droners
programme.desc: Race for a Cure: During a race in the swamp, the genies are victim of a pollen allergy. Whale decides to maintain the race, curious to see what solutions both teams will find. (S1 Ep24)

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Bear and the Butterfly: Grizzy wants to offer a butterfly to the she-bear he's in love with. But the Lemmings fight with him over the rare specimens he's spotted. (S1 Ep58)

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Get Off My Tennis Shoes: The Lemmings find a pack of icy mints that literally chill your breath. One blast from anyone who eats them freezes everything in sight! (S1 Ep59)

programme.desc: Ma Ben a Hana yn cystadlu mewn ras ganwio, ac mae'r ddau'n gystadleuol iawn... ond mae angen help Sam cyn hir! Ben and Hana compete in a canoe race, but Sam's help is needed eventually...

programme.title: Cacamwnci

programme.title: Sion y Chef

programme.title: Asra

programme.title: Caru Canu
programme.desc: Mae "Clap Clap un, dau, tri" yn gn hwyliog sy'n cyflwyn ystumiau amrywiol. "Clap Clap un, dau, tri" is a jolly song introducing various gestures.

programme.title: The Claim
programme.desc: 2000. Romance. Director: Michael Winterbottom. Stars Peter Mullan, Milla Jovovich & Wes Bentley. A man who sold his wife and daughter to get ahead in business has his past come back to haunt him. [S]

programme.title: Valentino
programme.desc: 1951. Biography. Directed by Lewis Allen. Stars Eleanor Parker, Otto Kruger & Anthony Dexter. The story of Rudolph Valentino and his rise from obscurity to fame, and the struggles that followed. [S]

programme.title: The Vengeance of She
programme.desc: 1968. Fantasy. Directed by Cliff Owen. Stars John Richardson, Olga Schoberov & Edward Judd. A young girl is drawn to the ancient city of Kuma to succeed the lost former ruler Ayesha as empress. [S]

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes
programme.desc: The Case of the Thistle Killer. 1954. Starring: Ronald Howard, Howard Marion-Crawford & Archie Duncan. Sherlock helps hunt down a killer of women who leaves three thistles next to each body. [S]

programme.title: Star of My Night
programme.desc: 1954. Romance. Directed by Paul Dickson. Stars Griffth Jones, Kathleen Byron & Hugh Williams. A cynical sculptor becomes inspired by a ballerina he meets, but this only enrages her jealous lover. [S]

programme.title: Death Goes To School
programme.desc: 1953. Crime drama with Barbara Murray and Gordon Jackson in the lead role. A rare, old British mystery surrounding a strangulation at a school that needs Scotland Yard to investigate. [S]

programme.title: The Jackals
programme.desc: 1967. Western. Directed by Robert D. Webb. Stars Vincent Price, Diana Ivarson & Robert Gunner. In South Africa, a wily old gold miner and his granddaughter are besieged by a group of bank robbers. [S]

programme.title: Look At Life Backroom of the Sky
programme.desc: 1963. A brilliant look at the Ministry of Aviation's centre at Boscombe Down, where plans are being tested for the services.

programme.title: River Beat

programme.title: Jane Eyre
programme.desc: 1997. Drama. Directed by Robert Young. Stars Samantha Morton, Ciarn Hinds & Gemma Jones. A young woman's life is shattered when scandals are revealed on the day she is to marry her employer. [S]

programme.title: Crown Court

programme.title: Crown Court
programme.desc: Patch's Patch - Part 2. 1973. Stars Richard Simpson, William Mervyn & John Rolls. Benjamin cross examines Superintendent James from the Fraud Squad and attempts to put the blame on the director. [S]

programme.title: Crown Court
programme.desc: Patch's Patch - Part 3. 1973. Stars Norman Rossington, Mary Larkin & Dorothy Vernon. Patch is warned about intimidating his former secretary and ex-employee Joyce gives character evidence for him. [S]

programme.title: Assignment K
programme.desc: 1968. Thriller. Directed by Val Guest. Stars Stephen Boyd, Camilla Sparv & Michael Redgrave. A toy manufacturer, who doubles as a British Intelligence Agent, becomes entangled with European spies. [S]

programme.title: Our Weekends in 1949

programme.title: Those British Faces

programme.title: Night of the Demon

programme.title: Up The Chastity Belt

programme.title: Up The Chastity Belt

programme.title: Confessions of Boston Blackie

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes
